headers.description: HTTP response headers as key-value pairs

closeTicket.description: Close a ticket by its id.

ticketId.description: ID of the ticket to close

closeTicket.title: Close ticket

createTicket.description: Creates a new ticket in Zendesk
createTicket.title: Create Ticket

createUser.description: Create an end user in the external service and in Botpress

email.description: Email address of the end user

name.description: Display name of the end user

pictureUrl.description: URL of the end user's avatar

userId.description: ID of the Botpress user representing the end user

createUser.title: Create external user

query.description: partial or full value of any user property, including name, email address, notes, or phone.

customers.description: Array of customer objects matching the search query

isOnline.description: Only return agents that are currently online

startHitl.description: Create a new HITL session in the external service and in Botpress

description.description: Description of the HITL session. This corresponds to a ticket description in systems that use tickets.

chatbotName.description: Name of the chatbot that will be used in the Zendesk ticket. Defaults to "Botpress".

chatbotPhotoUrl.description: Photo URL of the chatbot that will be used in the Zendesk ticket. Must be a publicly-accessible PNG image. Defaults to Botpress logo.

priority.description: Priority of the ticket. Leave empty for default priority.

messageHistory.description: History of all messages in the conversation up to this point. Should be displayed to the human agent in the external service.

title.description: Title of the HITL session. This corresponds to a ticket title in systems that use tickets.

userId.description: ID of the Botpress user representing the end user

conversationId.description: ID of the Botpress conversation representing the HITL session

startHitl.title: Start new HITL session

stopHitl.description: Stop an existing HITL session in the external service

conversationId.description: ID of the Botpress conversation representing the HITL session

stopHitl.title: Stop HITL session

syncKb.description: Sync Zendesk knowledge base to bot knowledge base

knowledgeBaseId.description: ID of the bot knowledge base you want to sync with

success.description: Indicates whether the sync operation was successful

syncKb.title: Sync Knowledge Base

id.description: The unique identifier of the Zendesk ticket associated with this conversation
id.title: Zendesk Ticket ID

hitl.description: Human in the loop channel for managing Zendesk tickets

zendeskCommentId.description: The ID of the comment in Zendesk

description: Optimize your support workflow. Trigger workflows from ticket updates as well as manage tickets, access conversations, and engage with customers.

chatbotName.description: Name of the chatbot that will be used in the Zendesk ticket. Defaults to "Botpress".

chatbotPhotoUrl.description: Photo URL of the chatbot that will be used in the Zendesk ticket. Must be a publicly-accessible PNG image. Defaults to Botpress logo.

priority.description: Priority of the ticket. Leave empty for default priority.

articlePublished.description: Triggered when an article is published

articleId.description: The unique identifier of the published article

articleTitle.description: The title of the published article

articleId.description: The unique identifier of the unpublished article
